about_the_game:
"Type Rider" is a typing-based tower defense game where you summon units by typing.

The protagonist, once known as the "Type Rider" for her high-speed typing skills while riding a motorcycle, has been tasked with resolving issues in a world overrun by ink lifeforms. She decides to ride her beloved bike once again.

  • Build Your Unique Deck: Construct your own deck with over 50 unique ink monsters, each possessing various elements such as attributes, classes, and special skills.

  • Typing Summons: A system where you summon ink monsters by successfully typing. Counter the approaching ink lifeforms by summoning your own creatures.

  • Strategic Battles: Use the order of summoning and spell cards strategically to gain an advantage in battle.
detailed_description:
"Type Rider" is a typing-based tower defense game where you summon units by typing.

The protagonist, once known as the "Type Rider" for her high-speed typing skills while riding a motorcycle, has been tasked with resolving issues in a world overrun by ink lifeforms. She decides to ride her beloved bike once again.

  • Build Your Unique Deck: Construct your own deck with over 50 unique ink monsters, each possessing various elements such as attributes, classes, and special skills.

  • Typing Summons: A system where you summon ink monsters by successfully typing. Counter the approaching ink lifeforms by summoning your own creatures.

  • Strategic Battles: Use the order of summoning and spell cards strategically to gain an advantage in battle.
name: Type Rider

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-12100F
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 1030
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10700F
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1650
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: "Type Rider" is a typing-based tower defense game where you summon units by typing. In a world overrun by ink lifeforms, the protagonist—once known as the "Type Rider" for her high-speed typing skills while riding a motorcycle—decides to ride her beloved bike once again to resolve the chaos.
